title: Air Products and Chemicals ' sales 2009 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2016.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
But, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2013 to 2011.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2011 to 2009.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2019 to 2018.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2014 to 2013.
gold: This statistic shows the revenues of Air Products and Chemicals from 2009 to 2019 . Air Products and Chemicals , Inc. is a United States-based international corporation whose major business is selling gases and chemicals for industrial uses . In 2019 , the company generated approximately 8.92 billion U.S. dollars of revenue .
